title: Build Electron app for URL review with local Claude Code
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Build a cross-platform Electron app where users input URLs only; the app fetches page content, then runs a local Claude Code instance using a provided system prompt ('LLM style-guide') to review each page and display a concise summary (key points, risks, recommendations). Include a simple URL input, async processing, clean results view, and clear errors for unreachable pages, with no cloud dependencies.
